definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: It consists of multiple passages and empty rooms.
sentences.chinese: 這層樓面上有多條過道和多個空房間。

sentences.english: The first time, she said the teacher into her empty room, because she cried.
sentences.chinese: 第一次，她說老師把她關進空房間，因爲她哭。

sentences.english: I'll put you in one of those rooms.
sentences.chinese: 我們的頂樓有一些空房間。

sentences.english: I'll check our room availability foe those days.
sentences.chinese: 我要查查那幾天有沒有空房間。
我來查一下是否有空房間。

sentences.english: In the bare room under the roof, there was a small, battered valise on his BED.
sentences.chinese: 在樓頂下面空房間的牀上，放着一隻破舊的小旅行包。

sentences.english: Don’t just empty the closet; design ways to keep it neat in the future too.
sentences.chinese: 不要只是清空房間，設計一些方法讓它始終保持整潔。

sentences.english: One empty room next to another after the bees fly out.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂都飛出去了，空房間毗鄰空房間。

sentences.english: One empty room next to another after the bees fly out.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂都飛出去了，空房間毗鄰空房間。

sentences.english: We traipsed around town trying to find a hotel that had vacancy.
sentences.chinese: 我們拖着腳走遍整個鎮，試着找有空房間的旅館。

sentences.english: He asked if there was a room to let.
sentences.chinese: 他問有沒有空房間能出租。

sentences.english: I wonder whether you have any vacancies for tonight?
sentences.chinese: 不知道你們今晚還有沒有空房間？

sentences.english: Yes, is there any vacant room for tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 是的，明天有沒有空房間？

sentences.english: I plan to hire my spare room out, so I can earn some money.
sentences.chinese: 我打算把我的空房間租出去賺些錢。

sentences.english: As filaments of mist subside, my empty room grows cold.
sentences.chinese: 霧消退，我的空房間長冷。

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: variant of 門閂|门闩[men2 shuan1]
to whisper to one another's ear
half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
